content: through the Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) standard to implement guidance requirements.  Common Criteria EP11 EAL4.  German Banking Industry Commission (GBIC).  Visa Format Preserving Encryption (VFPE) for credit card numbers.  Enhanced public key Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC) for users such as Chrome, Firefox, and Apple’s iMessage.  Accredited Standards Committee X9 Inc Technical Report-34 (ASC X9 TR-34) These enhancements are described in this chapter. IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ include standard cryptographic hardware and optional cryptographic features for flexibility and growth capability. IBM has a long history of providing hardware cryptographic solutions. This history stretches from the development of the Data Encryption Standard (DES) in the 1970s to the Crypto Express tamper-sensing and tamper-responding programmable features. Attention: Many older cryptographic algorithms like DES or RSA, and hashing algorithms such as SHA1 are considered weak
